General.Name: IDeA Indonesia Akademi Tbk PT
General.Description: PT Idea Indonesia Akademi Tbk focuses on recruitment, training, and distribution of hospitality human resources in collaboration with hotel chains and cruise line companies in Indonesia and internationally. It also develops and operates hotels and restaurants, as well as educational institutions. The company was founded in 2009 and is headquartered in South Jakarta, Indonesia. PT Idea Indonesia Akademi Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Idea Asia Investama.
